feed.title: Qingqiu Zhang
feed.subtitle: This is Qingqiu Zhang's personal website, which is uesd to record her learing path and some projects she had finished in the field of machine learning.

entry.title: Diabetes Data Analytics (2) -- Model Training, Evaluating and Testing
entry.summary:
In the previous article, I did data preprocessing. It is often seen as one of the most important step during a machine learning project. One must be patient with the data manimulation no matter how troublesome it is. In this article, we are finally exposed to the model traing procedure. I will demonstrate how to conduct different types of classification models and how to evalute their performance.
For everything you may need, visit:
Source Data
Hope this helps!

entry.title: Diabetes Data Analytics (1) -- Data Preprocessing
entry.summary:
This is a thorough analysis of diabetes dataset from Kaggle. In this article, I will demonstrate how to do an end-to-end machine learning project using diverse classification models including K-Nearest Neighbors, Logistic Regression, Support Vector Machine, Decision Tree and Random Forest.
For everything you may need, visit:
Source Data
Hope this helps!
